overview: Raja has 13 years of experience in corporate finance. Rajaâ€™s previous assignment was with Jet Airways, Indiaâ€™s leading private-sector airline. As Executive Vice President (Finance) with Jet Airways, Rajaâ€™s responsibilities included budgeting, financial control, capital raising and investor relations. Raja joined Jet Airways in June 2005 from UBS Investment Bank in Hong Kong, where he led the Asian transport investment banking team and advised companies across Asia, including Jet Airways, on their financing and strategic initiatives. Earlier Raja worked with Goldman Sachs in Singapore and with Lehman Brothers in London, Hong Kong and New York. Raja received an MBA from INSEAD, an MA in Economics from Tufts University and a BA from Hamilton College. He also completed two years of PhD coursework in Economics at Duke University. Raja is married and has 2 kids. He is an avid endurance athlete who also plays competitive squash, notwithstanding his advancing age.
